name: Swing (itch)
description:
School project at AIE Seattle.  Made in 3 weeks (total of 9 days) in Unreal Engine 4.  All assets taken from Unreal's Platformer Game example project.

Credit to Epic Games and Mixamo for most of the assets.  The swords and enemies were made by some bored art students.

The streetlights are over-powered.  Hold left shift to sprint (I forgot to include that in the how-to page).

Credits - Arturo  Moreno (AI programmer), Benjamin Vongtawan (Character Programmer), Henry Banks (Gameplay Programmer), Taylor Dickson (Artist)
